info.description: This is the API documentation for the Kanban application.
info.title: Kanban API Documentation

get.description: get the status of the server.
get.summary: Show the status of the server.

post.description: Authenticate user and return a JWT token

get.description: Retrieves all organizations owned by the authenticated user.

post.description: Creates a new organization associated with the authenticated user.

401.description: Unauthorized (if token is missing or invalid)

get.description: Retrieves a specific organization by its ID, ensuring the authenticated user is the owner.

403.description: Forbidden (if user is not the owner)

put.description: Updates a specific organization by its ID, ensuring the authenticated user is the owner.

delete.description: Deletes a specific organization by its ID, ensuring the authenticated user is the owner.

get.description: Retrieves all projects within a specified organization. User must own the organization.
get.summary: Get all projects in an organization

post.description: Creates a new project within a specified organization. User must own the organization.

403.description: Forbidden (if user does not own organization)

409.description: Conflict (if project name already exists in organization)

get.description: Retrieves a specific project by its ID within a specified organization. User must own the organization.

put.description: Updates a specific project by its ID within a specified organization. User must own the organization.

delete.description: Deletes a specific project by its ID within a specified organization. User must own the organization.

get.description: Retrieves all boards within a specified project. User must own the project's organization.
get.summary: Get all boards in a project

post.description: Creates a new board within a specified project. User must own the project's organization.

get.description: Retrieves a specific board by its ID within a specified project. User must own the project's organization.

put.description: Updates a specific board by its ID within a specified project. User must own the project's organization.

delete.description: Deletes a specific board by its ID within a specified project. User must own the project's organization.

get.description: Retrieves all lists within a specified board. User must own the board's project's organization.
get.summary: Get all lists in a board

post.description: Creates a new list within a specified board. User must own the board's project's organization.

get.description: Retrieves a specific list by its ID within a specified board. User must own the board's project's organization.

put.description: Updates a specific list by its ID within a specified board. User must own the board's project's organization.

delete.description: Deletes a specific list by its ID within a specified board. User must own the board's project's organization.

get.description: Retrieves all cards within a specified list. User must own the list's board's project's organization.
get.summary: Get all cards in a list

post.description: Creates a new card within a specified list. User must own the list's board's project's organization.

get.description: Retrieves a specific card by its ID within a specified list. User must own the list's board's project's organization.

put.description: Updates a specific card by its ID within a specified list. User must own the list's board's project's organization. Supports moving card to another list.

delete.description: Deletes a specific card by its ID within a specified list. User must own the list's board's project's organization.

post.description: Register a new user with username, email, and password

ApiKeyAuth.description: Enter your JWT token in the format "Bearer <your_token>".
ApiKeyAuth.name: Authorization

tags.description: "Operations related to Kanban boards within projects"
tags.name: Boards
